attributes.action: HELP VOICE OUR ABSOLUTE ABHORRANCE TO SUICIDE BOMBINGS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is not a request for financial assistance
 
PLEASE  HELP TO ARRANGE A GLOBAL DAY OF RALLIES AND MARCHES TO PROTEST THE USE OF SUICIDE BOMBERS.
If enough of us, world media, government leaders and human rights activists protested enough and made it clear that suicide bombers are an abhorrent way to protest, targeting innocent civilains and the destructive abuse of life is just not acceptable. We must make it clear by every possible means of protest that their can be no sympathy for the institutuions that perpetrate this diabolical barbaric act of kiling and it must be stopped and outlawed by all means available to us.. People power is the most lethal weapon available to us   lets use it?

rejection.details: Petitions to the Number 10 site should request an action that can be taken by Government or the PM, usually concerning policy matters. For more information, please refer to our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
